comments.text:
Created attachment 558596
Second Manifesto Hebrew translation by Ophir Setter and Meirav Amichay

attachment 422373 in bug 433928 comment 99 contains an Hebrew version of the Mozilla Manifesto. We were translated it from MS-Word to HTML and pasted in for peer review in our community wiki [http://mozilla.org.il/wiki/The_Mozilla_Manifesto]. 

Due to a failure to complete the review task it was never submitted to mozilla.org/about/manifesto.


Today some other people have contacted David Boswell with yet another (probably independent) translation (attached to this bug). We want to merge between the two translations to one awesome translation, and submit it to mozilla.org.
comments.raw_text:

comments.raw_text:
Manifesto is currently available for localization via Pontoon, at this point the text included here is likely out of data.

Should we close this bug?
